thread.title: One-Time NBC President Pier Mapes Dies
thread.title_full: One-Time NBC President Pier Mapes Dies

title: One-Time NBC President Pier Mapes Dies
text: One-Time NBC President Pier Mapes Dies Tuesday, 20 October 2015 (4 minutes ago) Mapes worked twice for NBC. For five years beginning in 1963, he held sales services and affiliate relations positions. He then went to Blair Television for seven years. He returned to NBC in 1978 as VP of network planning and was named president in 1982. He survived held that post until his retirement in 1994.
